message: Some obvious ones: On Writing Well by Zinsser, On Writing by King, Elements of Style by S&W, Writing Tools by Peter Clark.
Currently reading 'Style: Towards Clarity and Grace' by Williams, which is very good and under-appreciated.
I think I've read most of them--but the best is Bird by Bird by Anne Lamott.
I haven't read Bird by Bird, I'll grab it next.
